Package ePortfolio

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • ePortfolio.Portfolio
  • public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
    The Portfolio class maintains the ArrayList investments. It maintains the array list by keeping track of buying, selling, updating, computing the total gain for investments, and searching the list given certain parameters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Investment> investments
